songs.lyrics:
[Spoken Intro]
Black Heart Revenge, here, for all y'all bitch ass niggas, here's the mixtape

Yea, ay, damn, okay, look, ay, damn, ay, look, damn, okay

[Verse 1]
Ball out when I ball
That's why my wrist, it stay floodin'
Burning bridges with them fuck niggas
Like "fuck what they wanted"
Took a trip down memory lane
When they thought I was a busta
Now these Benjis make my back hurt
Backwards; that's how she want it, okay
All my life all I ever wanted was some Rick Owens
And a crib out by the lake, okay
The flex for the summer
All I need is weed and pussy
Stay content under covers, okay
This money come and go
So we need more by the bundle

[Chorus]
Cash load, with my stacks, boat load, thick bitch, bring it back, ay, you know I like it like--ay you know I like it like that, you know I like it like--ay, okay, cash load, with my stacks, boat load, thick bitch, bring it back, ay, you know I--you know I like it like that, you know I--, you know I like it like that, you know I like it like that

[Refrain]
One hunnid, ay, two hunnid, three hunnids, I got four hunnids, ay six hunnids, when I pull up, yeah, four cups, ay, two cups, stuffed, pour a deuce, yea, pour a deuce, yea, yea, yea
Damn, one hunnid, I got two hunnid, three hunnids, four hunnids, I got six hunnids, in my cup, pour a four

[Verse 2]
Peep how Lil' LaFlare just came through flexin'
Boy, I sauce like Ginóbili
Back in '97, Daddy cookin' crack just to off it
19 and I'm nappy-headed so my thoughts, they kill often
Tatted "Rich Life" on my forehead
That's my gang and they know it
16 running with addiction
No this shit is not normal
I got my dick up out the dirt
[Too much, I done went flooded]?
Came through shining like a comet
Asteroids shine like my diamonds
Fiji Water top the [?]
Lil' baby we stuntin'

[Chorus]
Cash load, with my stacks, boat load, thick bitch, bring it back, yea, ay, you know I like it like--ay, you know I like it like that, you know I like it like--ay, okay, cash load, ay, with my stacks, boat load, thick bitch, bring it back, you know I--you know I like it like--ay, you know I, you know I like it like that, you know I like it like that, yea yea
songs.title: Like It Like That
